name: RM - Landscape - 70s Sci-Fi Scape
prompt: retro sci-fi landscape of {prompt} . 1970s paperback cover art, airbrush texture, surreal planets, vibrant colors, John Harris or Chris Foss aesthetic, mysterious vastness, space opera vibe
negative_prompt: photorealistic, digital, modern, 3d render, gritty, grey, boring

name: RM - Landscape - Abyssal Underwater
prompt: breathtaking underwater seascape of {prompt} . bioluminescent flora, sunbeams piercing through deep blue water, volumetric god rays, schools of tropical fish, coral reef detail, bubbles and marine snow, cinematic aquatic photography, 8k resolution
negative_prompt: dry, land, desert, sky, clouds, birds, people, blurry, low quality, oversaturated

name: RM - Landscape - Alpine Sublime
prompt: majestic alpine landscape of {prompt} . snow-capped peaks, crystal clear mountain lake, pine forests, crisp cold air atmosphere, Switzerland or Rockies aesthetic, high dynamic range
negative_prompt: desert, tropical, warm, blurry, flat, city, smog

name: RM - Landscape - Ansel Adams
prompt: majestic black and white landscape photography of {prompt} by Ansel Adams . Zone System exposure, high contrast, deep shadows and bright highlights, f/64 group aesthetic, sharp focus, dramatic clouds, Yosemite style
negative_prompt: color, sepia, digital, low contrast, soft focus, blurry, painting
